QuestData.Title: Talonpriest Ishaal
QuestData.RewardText: My purpose as a Talonpriest has been fulfilled, though Iskar and Zellek must think me a fool for altering the sacred rites.$B$BI care not for their approval, and I am done hiding in the shadows.$B$BLet me fight for you. I should like to improve this world before I fade away from it.
